phrases: But if I were to be allowed to have a wish come true,
I would wish it was love.
I would hope it was love.
Why did not you tell me?
Kurumi should be thankful of me.
Why is she trying to screw me over?
This is just my guess, but...
You know how I am pretty sharp, right?
I have always had a feeling...
I bet she is got the wrong idea.
You know, I am like Ryu's sister.
Sort of lame, her getting jealous of me.
Come on, it is obvious she is liked Kazehaya the whole time.
I could not take it anymore.
I do not know what to do.
I just like Kazehaya-kun that much.
I-I do not have romantic feelings for Sanada-kun.
He is nice, and he helped me,
I am going to believe you.
Do not look at me right now,
Did I say something horribly rude about Sanada-kun?
I mean, he is a good person.
Is not this what it means to like someone?
This feeling I have towards Kazehaya-kun.
And I wanted to be the one helping you.
I might not be able to cheer for you all the time from now on.
I am really not who you think I am.
Selfish or self-centered, do anything for me or do not,
what do you think about going out?
No, I mean, as boyfriend and girlfriend.
I cannot even begin to imagine it; it is totally alien to me.
I do not have a clue.
She is probably never even imagined going out with someone.
I still do not get it!
So wait, if she likes Kazehaya, then why would she help out someone who likes him?
Like I said, she does not want him to have a girlfriend.
The whole point was to make that stupid pact.
That is why she set up all those decoys.
I guess you do not have to get it.
Ryu, Sadako was looking for you.
I do not think this is from her, though.
T-This obviously is not Sadako's writing.
Did you find that in your shoebox?
Did someone come when you were with Sawako?
Shouta and um... that long-haired girl with the summer-ish sounding name.
What is with that evil grin, Yano-chin?
I do not know what is going on, but let us go to Kurumi!
Why do you know things that I do not?
I was keeping quiet until I was confident because I knew you would run off like that.
Let us go then, you have confidence now right?
Evidence that Kurumi could never dismiss.
And then I will pound her into a pulp!
Why are not you coming back, Kazehaya?
I should have gone after him and interrupted.
But that would have annoyed him.
He would not go out with her, would he?
I was just cleaning this up.
Hurry up and do it then.
I have the keys, hurry up and put it away.
Why do not you go already?
Why is she everywhere I am?
Why is she leading me on?
Sorry, I am not into kids.
I would have fallen for me if I was a woman too.
Well, to put it this way, you are 10 years early.
Why do I have to get rejected here?
Settle for some brat from your own class or something.
Sorry, I did not mean to eavesdrop.
I will not tell anyone, trust me.
You are slacking, are not you?
I will find you some really hard work.
Do not go telling people, Pin.
It was like, by the time we knew, everyone was talking about it.
We would not know if it was her that started it.
Maybe we should hit up division A.
Okay, let us try asking them.
Yeah, I saw her making rumors.
That was the first time I heard rumors about Sadako.
I remember being surprised at how bad the rumor's gotten.
I got you, Kurumi, you bitch.
Just wait, I will even make you fess up what brand of toner you use.
Is not that sort of personal?
Yano-san and Yoshida-san are not here.
Oh, maybe they are at volleyball practice.
I wonder what they would say if I told them that.
It is even better than I thought, being in a world not all by myself.
and to be able to tell people about it,
I want to tell her mine too.
I just realized, we can talk about love together.
So tell me, what is this about, Kurumi-chan?
You said you never spread any rumors, did not you?
Do not try to play dumb.
I have the girls from division A backing me up.
Damn, it is like a samurai drama!
Even if I did spread that rumor, that is not proof that I started it.
Is this succulent, spotless face of yours still going to talk smack?
You think I cannot tell the difference between maintained skin and unmaintained skin?
We asked everyone in the school.
Liars go to hell, you know that?
Good job, Chizu, you did well.
You seem pretty different from before.
So, about that, did it work out?
I have not seen you three together much.
That rumor from inside the washroom,
Sawako, it was Kurumi that made you suffer so much.
The answer that I found and want to share.
